title: Watch Dogs v.1.05.324 [4xDVD5] + dlc's [BB] repack Mr DJ

LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
Watch dogs + all dlc's unlocked

DON'T TRY TO RUN IT ON A LEGACY HARDWARE AND ASK FOR HELP FOR CRASHING ISSUES !!

- Blume Agent Pack

To verify the dlc's present in the game, open the game, at the interface menu select 'Additional Content' and then select 'Acquired Content' , list of present dlc's will be shown....
Future RELOADED updates are compatible with this release .....

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS :

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

After running setup, Click on next, specify the directory where you want to install the game and then click on next, again next, make sure 'Create a desktop icon' checkbox is ticked and then click on next and finally click on install .... after setup completes, Direct X and Visual C++ updates will install, open the game from desktop shortcut....

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any savegame/crash issue. If it still crashes, lower the graphics settings from ingame options and make sure your graphics drivers are updated.
